site_name: Ellen Wilkinson High School For Girls

open_spaces_details.description: The temporary buildings locations have been carefully considered by the school and the decision was made to have them located to either side of the multi- use games area on the south of the site.

phasing_details.phase_detail: Install the 5 section multi - use building

description: Installation of two single storey buildings to be used as classroom space and multi-use space for a temporary period of two years (Use Class F1) (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)
subdivision_of_building: The temporary buildings are to be located only south of the site.
decision_conditions: The permission for two (2) single storey buildings shall be for a limited period of 2 years only, expiring on the date of this decision notice when the use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the single storey buildings removed and the land reinstated to its former condition to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: The siting, design and materials of construction are not considered suitable for a permanent building/structure, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3, D4 and S5 of the London Plan (2021), Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18) and the NPPF (2023).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and supporting document: 1592-LBE-0S-XX-DR-A-P-L001 (Location Plan);1592-LBE-0S-XX-DR-A-P-L002 (Existing Site Plan); 1592-LBE-0S-XX-DR-A-P-L003 (Proposed Site Plan); 1592-LBE-0S-XX-DR-A-P-L200 (Proposed 3D View); 1592-LBE-B1-00-DR-A-P-B01 (Proposed Temp Building 01); 1592-LBE-B2-00-DR-A-P-B01 (Proposed Temp Building 02) and Design and Access Statement dated September 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with those described in the hereby approved drawings listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18) and the NPPF (2023).
